name: iota (itch) (itb interactive)
description:
in iota, there is no jump button. you will bounce from the floor to the ceiling as you make your way left, right, up, and down,  dodging saws and avoiding spikes as you make your way through 36 handcrafted, grueling levels.

iota is the ultimate challenge for even the most seasoned gamer.

so... do you have what it takes?

can you beat iota?
